lessons.japanese: それゆえに一年の残りの期間は閉鎖される事になるだろう。
lessons.english: Therefore it will be closed for the rest of the year.

lessons.japanese: それゆえここにとどまらざるを得ないだろう。
lessons.english: Hence, I shall have to stay here.
